scripts.dev: concurrently -n "app,projects,react,vue,dotnet" -c "cyan,magenta,blue,green,yellow" "npm run dev:app" "npm run dev:projects" "npm run dev:react" "npm run dev:vue" "npm run dev:dotnet"
scripts.build: npm run build:app && npm run build:projects && npm run build:react && npm run build:vue && npm run build:dotnet
scripts.install:all: npm run install:app && npm run install:projects && npm run install:react && npm run install:vue && npm run restore:dotnet
scripts.clean: npm run clean:app && npm run clean:projects && npm run clean:react && npm run clean:vue && npm run clean:dotnet
scripts.lint: npm run lint:app && npm run lint:projects && npm run lint:react && npm run lint:vue
scripts.format: npm run format:app && npm run format:projects && npm run format:react && npm run format:vue
scripts.format:app: cd app && npm run format || echo 'No format script in app'
scripts.format:projects: cd projects && npm run format || echo 'No format script in projects'
